text: Jo log imaan laaye hain aur unki aulad bhi kisi darja-e-imaan mein unke naksh-e-qadam par chali hai unki us aulad ko bhi hun (jannat mein) unke saath mila denge aur unke amaal mein koi ghaata(loss) unko na denge. Har shaks apne kasb ke aevaz rehan hai.( Every person is pledged to what he did)
